contentrichtext.text: '''Red Hill''' may refer to: ==Places== In '''Australia''': * [[Red Hill, Queensland]] * [[Red Hill, Victoria]] * [[Red Hill South, Victoria]] * [[Red Hill, Australian Capital Territory]] * [[Red Hill, Western Australia]] In '''Canada''': *[[Red Hill Valley]] is a valley in Hamilton, Ontario *[[Red Hill Creek]] is a creek in Hamilton, Ontario In '''England''': * [[Red Hill, Bournemouth]] * [[Red Hill, Hampshire]] * [[Red Hill, Herefordshire]] * [[Red Hill, Kent]] * [[Red Hill, Leicestershire]] * [[Red Hill, Lincolnshire]] - [[Lincolnshire Wolds]] * [[Red Hill, London]] * [[Red Hill, Warwickshire]] * [[Red Hill, West Yorkshire]] * [[Red Hill, Worcester]] - an area to the SE of the city In '''Hong Kong''': *[[Red Hill, Hong Kong]], Hong Kong Island In the '''United States''' (by state): *[[Red Hill, Kentucky]] * [[Red Hill Douglas County, Oregon AVA]], Oregon wine region * [[Red Hill Underground Fuel Storage Facility]], Pearl Harbor, Hawaii * [[Red Hill (New Hampshire)]] in New Hampshire * [[Red Hill, New Mexico]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Golden Valley County, Montana|Golden Valley, Montana]] * [[Red Hill (New York)]] in Denning, New York ** [[Red Hill Fire Observation Station]], the fire tower on top of that peak *[[Red Hill (Bullock, North Carolina)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Granville County, North Carolina|listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Granville County, North Carolina]] * [[Red Hill, Pennsylvania]] * [[Red Hill, South Carolina]] *[[Red Hill (Brookneal, Virginia)]], [[National Register of Historic Places listings in Charlotte County, Virginia|listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Charlotte County, Virginia]] * [[Red Hill Patrick Henry National Memorial]] in Virginia * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Big Horn County, Montana|Big Horn County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Carter County, Montana|Carter County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Jefferson County, Montana|Jefferson County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Judith Basin County, Montana|Judith Basin County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Lake County, Montana|Lake County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Lewis and Clark County, Montana|Lewis and Clark County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Madison County, Montana|Madison County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Mineral County, Montana|Mineral County, Montana]] * Red Hill in [[List of mountains in Powder River County, Montana|Powder River County, Montana]] *[[Red Hill, West Virginia]] In '''Wales''': * [[Red Hill, Pembrokeshire]] ==Wine== *[[Red Hill Douglas County, Oregon AVA]], located in the Umpqua Valley AVA of Oregon *[[Dundee Hills AVA]], which includes the ''Red Hills of Dundee'' in the Willamette Valley AVA *[[Red Hills Lake County AVA]], located in North Coast AVA of California ==Other== * [[Red Hill (baseball)]] (1893–1938), an American baseball player * [[Red Hill (salt making)]] * [[Red Hill (film)|''Red Hill'' (film)]], a 2010 Australian film * [[William "Red" Hill, Sr.]] (1888 – May 14, 1942) Canadian daredevil and noted river rescuer in [[Niagara Falls, Ontario]] * [[Red Hill Records]] ==See also== * [[Redhill (disambiguation)]] * [[Red Hills (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
